pageTitle: Global Alliance Offers Four Scholarships for the Executive MScom Program | Global Alliance for Public Relations and Communication Management
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {18977=USI (Università della Svizzera italiana) was founded in 1996. As a public institution, it is part of the Swiss university system that comprises nine cantonal universities and two Federal Institutes of Technology. It is an academic competence center for communications research and the only Swiss university with a fully-fledged communications faculty and extensive experience in executive education for communication professionals. Students and faculty come from 40 different countries around the world. Benefiting from a unique geographic, and cultural location, USI is a distinguished multilingual and multicultural university, with a broad international outlook. http://www.usi.ch/, 16609=The four Global Alliance scholarships, based on financial need, are available to applicants who do not anticipate receiving employer assistance in funding their executive education. Each scholarship totals CHF 23,000 (EUR 15,282), half of the tuition for MScom, and will be deducted from the total fee for the program. The scholarship application deadline is October 31, 2010. A joint Global Alliance-MScom group will define qualitative criteria for the assignment of the scholarships and these will be made public through the two organization's websites.}
